EmailTemplate.description: Template used for sending notification to employee when a comment is added by an Agent on a Employee Portal Inquiry
EmailTemplate.name: Employee Portal Inquiry Comment Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: You Have a New MySutter Connection Comment Waiting for You
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
A Customer Service Representative has responded to Service Request Number {!Case.CaseNumber} regarding your {!Case.Customer_Intent__c} inquiry that was created on {!Case.CreatedDate}.
To view the comment and respond, click on the following link :
https://mysutterconnection.force.com/SH_CaseDetail?Id={!Case.Id}
Thank you,
Sutter Health
